resource.pluginArgs: --ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/Pfalciparum.ec --evidenceCode "GeneDB" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

--externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Pfalciparum.GO --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT g.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id UNION SELECT taf.source_id, taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.translatedAAFeature taf" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "GeneDB" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs --skipBadGOTerms @@dataDir@@/badGOTerms.log

resource.unpack: makeProductFile --format gff3 --fileOrDir @@dataDir@@/.gff --output_file @@dataDir@@/PfalciparumProduct.tab --feat_with_geneid mRNA --geneid_qualifier Parent --feat_with_product polypeptide --prodfeatid_qualifier ID --product_qualifier product

makeProductFile --format gff3 --fileOrDir @@dataDir@@/.gff --output_file @@dataDir@@/PfalciparumProduct.tab --feat_with_geneid pseudogenic_transcript --geneid_qualifier Parent --feat_with_product polypeptide --prodfeatid_qualifier ID --product_qualifier product --append

resource.pluginArgs: --ECMappingFile @@dataDir@@/Pfid.txt --evidenceCode "Hagai Ginsburg" --aaSeqLocusTagMappingSql "SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.GeneFeature g, dots.Transcript t, dots.TranslatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.source_id = ? AND g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id"

--sourceIdRegex ">(\w+)" --fastaFile @@dataDir@@/pfc.fasta --externalDatabaseName %RESOURCE_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --SOTermName 'EST' --ncbiTaxId 36329 --libraryStrain '3D7' --libraryStage 'Asexual stage' --libraryVector 'pOTB7b' --contactName 'Malcolm Gardner' --contactAddress1 'Seattle Biomedical Research Institute' --contactAddress2 '307 Westlake Avenue N., Suite 500 Seattle, WA 98109-5219' --libraryName 'Zhang/Gardner Pf 3D7 mixed asexual' --libraryDesc "CDNA was prepared from polyA+ RNA using the SMART cDNA Library Construction Kit and was cloned into the pOTB7b vector, a derivative of pOTB7 (1.8 kb) in which a SfiI stuffer fragment was inserted between the BamHI and XhoI sites of pOTB7.PFOCB48 indicates plate and well. T indicates dye terminator chemistry. F and R indicates M13 forward and reverse primers.The R primer is at the 3' polyA end of the mRNA."

--sourceIdRegex "\|(\w+\(\S+\))$" --fastaFile @@dataDir@@/reffull_pf.fas --externalDatabaseName %RESOURCE_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --SOTermName 'transcript' --ncbiTaxId 36329 --libraryStrain '3D7' --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --putativeFullLength --libraryName 'derivedFromWatanabePf3D7_cultured' --libraryDesc "Predicted full length transcript sequence produced after BLAT alignment of the WatanabePf3D7_cultured EST library sequences to the genome and correction of the cDNA sequences using annotated gene sequences."

--sourceIdRegex "\|(\w+)$" --fastaFile @@dataDir@@/onepass_pf.fas_fixed --externalDatabaseName %RESOURCE_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --SOTermName 'EST' --ncbiTaxId 36329 --libraryStrain '3D7' --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --libraryName 'WatanabePf3D7_cultured' --libraryDesc "P. falciparum 3D7 parasites were cultured either in a candle jar (XPFn, XPF2n) or in the mixed gas consisting of 3% oxygen, 5% carbon dioxide and 92% nitrogen using blood type A erythrocytes and frozen human plasma."

--sourceIdRegex "^>[A-Za-z0-9]+\|([A-Za-z0-9]+)\|" --fastaFile @@dataDir@@/PUA_seq4web.fsa_fixed --externalDatabaseName %RESOURCE_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %RESOURCE_VERSION% --SOTermName 'EST' --ncbiTaxId 36329 --contactName 'I. Florent, B. Setterblad, E. Guillaume, C. Da Silva, F. Artiguenave, E. Marechal, O. Gascuel, P. Wincker and P. Grellier' --contactAddress1 "Museum National d Histoire Naturelle, Paris; Genoscope; CEA Grenoble; LIRMM Montpellier" --contactAddress2 "" --libraryName 'GenoScope Schizont enriched' --libraryDesc "Plasmodium falciparum FcB1 strain, erythrocitic stages, schizont/merozoite stage library."

resource.unpack: dumpSequencesFromTable.pl --outputFile @@dataDir@@/PfalciparumChroms.fasta --idSQL "SELECT source_id,sequence FROM DoTS.ExternalNASequence ns, SRes.ExternalDatabase ed, SRes.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr WHERE ed.name = 'Pfalciparum_chromosomes_RSRC' AND ed.external_database_id = edr.external_database_id AND edr.version = '@@Pfalciparum_chromosomes_VER@@' and ns.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id"

for f in `ls @@dataDir@@/data.exchange`; do cat @@dataDir@@/data.exchange/$f | adjustPlasmoEmblFile > @@dataDir@@/data.exchange/$f.fixed; cat @@dataDir@@/data.exchange/$f.fixed | perl -pe 's/MAL(\d+ standard)/Pf3D7_0$1/' | perl -pe 's/Pf3D7_01([01234] standard)/Pf3D7_1$1/' | perl -pe 's/(\/systematic_id="[^"]+)/$1_v5.5/' > @@dataDir@@/fixed/$f.fixed; done

resource.pluginArgs: --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --inputFile @@dataDir@@/gene_association.GeneDB_Pfalciparum.20080403 --goExternalDatabaseSpec "GO_RSRC|@@GO_VER@@" --seqIdSql "SELECT regexp_replace(g.source_id,'_v5.5$',''), taf.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.genefeature g, dots.transcript t, dots.translatedAAFeature taf WHERE g.na_feature_id = t.parent_id AND t.na_feature_id = taf.na_feature_id and g.source_id like '%v5.5'" --targetTable "DoTS::TranslatedAASequence" --lineOfEvidence "Annotation Center" --inputIdColumn id --tolerateMissingSeqs

resource.unpack: convertWinzelerGeneticVarToGff --input_file @@dataDir@@/SFPdata_1.tab.txt --strain 7G8 --strain D6 --strain W2 --strain HB3 --strain Dd2 --strain FCR3 --strain FCB --strain C188 --strain 18.02 --strain 31.01 --strain 41.02 --strain 48.02 --strain 51.02 --output_file @@dataDir@@/WinzelerGeneticVariationArray_RSRC.gff

resource.pluginArgs: --contact @@PlasmoSageTags.Contact@@ --arrayDesignName 'P.falciparum SAGE Tags' --arrayDesignVersion '1' --studyName 'Transcriptional profile of P.falciparum by Serial analysis of gene expression' --studyDescription '' --freqFile @@dataDir@@/freqs.tsv
